dcterms:creator: Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A citation network that extends the prevalent small Cora network, where nodes are papers and edges denote citation relations. The classes of nodes are obtained based on the paper topic.
dcterms:title: CoraFull

dcterms:creator: Weihua Hu
Matthias Fey
Marinka Zitnik
Yuxiao Dong
Hongyu Ren
Bowen Liu
Michele Catasta
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: A directed citation network consisting of CS papers from MAG, where nodes represent CS arXiv papers and edges denote citation relations. The classes of nodes are assigned based on the 40 subject areas of CS papers in arXiv.
dcterms:title: ogbn-arxiv

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: A co-authorship graph based on the Microsoft Academic Graph, where nodes are authors connected by edges if they co-authored a paper. Node features represent paper keywords for each author's papers.
dcterms:title: Coauthor-CS

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Günnemann
dcterms:description: Includes segments of the Amazon co-purchase graph, where nodes represent goods and edges indicate that two goods are frequently bought together. Node features are bag-of-words encoded product reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Computer

dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William Cohen
Ruslan Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent papers and edges represent citation relationships. Each node has a predefined feature with 1,433 dimensions.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William Cohen
Ruslan Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent scientific publications and edges represent citation relationships. Each node has a predefined feature with 3,703 dimensions.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer
